channel.title: 2021-05-15 SocialCG Meeting
channel.description:
Per [the wiki](https://www.w3.org/wiki/SocialCG#Meetings) and [the calendar ](https://cloud.w3c.social/apps/calendar/p/GzxsDfE6CKtp9MHX/dayGridMonth/now), this meeting will be at:
* 5pm UTC * 1pm EDT * 10am PDT
[date=2021-05-15 time=15:00:00 timezone="UTC"] → [date=2021-05-15 time=16:00:00 timezone="UTC"]
# Agenda:
* 5min - quick introductions/reintroductions * 5min - @bengo - reminders * poll for weekend meeting time https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/proposal-rank-choice-meeting-times-for-the-weekend-socialcg-meeting/1713 * proposed an agenda item
# Candidate Agenda Items
Please reply below to propose an agenda item. Please consider doing some ahead-of-time work to articulate the item, and linking it in your proposal so others can come prepared to build consensus or raise objections that we can discuss in our limited time together.
## Example Agenda Item
> @bengo - 5min - quick introductions, reintroductions (<= 30 seconds each)
Read [this for more on agendas ](https://theanarchistlibrary.org/library/c-t-butler-and-amy-rothstein-on-conflict-and-consensus-a-handbook-on-formal-consensus-decisionm#toc62).
### [Meeting URL](https://bbb.w3c.social/b/rhi-vp1-fv6-vn7)

item.title: 2021-05-15 SocialCG Meeting
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
I want to thank all the people who contacted me directly for their solidarity.
I am very happy about that.
And I will invite everybody to the next redaktor meeting.
See you in the active channels !

Read full topic

item.description:
Sorry people,
I could not pin or notify because someone deleted my admin rights here.

So:
The meeting did not take place.
